pokemons.name: bulbasaur
pokemons.quote:
A strange seed was
planted on its
back at birth. The plant sprouts
and grows with
this POKéMON.

pokemons.name: ivysaur
pokemons.quote:
When the bulb on
its back grows
large, it appears to lose the
ability to stand
on its hind legs.

pokemons.name: venusaur
pokemons.quote:
The plant blooms
when it is
absorbing solar energy. It stays
on the move to
seek sunlight.

pokemons.name: charmander
pokemons.quote:
Obviously prefers
hot places. When
it rains, steam is said to spout
from the tip of
its tail.

pokemons.name: charmeleon
pokemons.quote:
When it swings
its burning tail,
it elevates the temperature to
unbearably high
levels.

pokemons.name: charizard
pokemons.quote:
Spits fire that
is hot enough to
melt boulders. Known to cause
forest fires
unintentionally.

pokemons.name: squirtle
pokemons.quote:
Shoots water at
prey while in the
water. Withdraws into
its shell when in
danger.

pokemons.name: wartortle
pokemons.quote:
When tapped, this
POKéMON will pull
in its head, but its tail will
still stick out a
little bit.

pokemons.name: blastoise
pokemons.quote:
It deliberately
makes itself heavy
so it can with­ stand the recoil
of the water jets
it fires.

pokemons.name: caterpie
pokemons.quote:
It releases a stench from its red
antenna to repel enemies. It
grows by molting repeatedly.

pokemons.name: metapod
pokemons.quote:
This POKéMON is
vulnerable to
attack while its shell is soft,
exposing its weak
and tender body.

pokemons.name: butterfree
pokemons.quote:
In battle, it
flaps its wings
at high speed to release highly
toxic dust into
the air.

pokemons.name: weedle
pokemons.quote:
Often found in
forests, eating
leaves. It has a sharp
venomous stinger
on its head.

pokemons.name: kakuna
pokemons.quote:
Almost incapable
of moving, this
POKéMON can only harden its shell
to protect itself
from predators.

pokemons.name: beedrill
pokemons.quote:
Flies at high
speed and attacks
using its large venomous stingers
on its forelegs
and tail.

pokemons.name: pidgey
pokemons.quote:
A common sight in
forests and woods.
It flaps its wings at ground
level to kick up
blinding sand.

pokemons.name: pidgeotto
pokemons.quote:
Very protective
of its sprawling
territorial area, this POKéMON will
fiercely peck at
any intruder.

pokemons.name: pidgeot
pokemons.quote:
When hunting, it
skims the surface
of water at high speed to pick off
unwary prey such
as MAGIKARP.

pokemons.name: rattata
pokemons.quote:
Bites anything
when it attacks.
Small and very quick, it is a
common sight in
many places.

pokemons.name: raticate
pokemons.quote:
It uses its whis­
kers to maintain
its balance. It apparently
slows down if
they are cut off.

pokemons.name: spearow
pokemons.quote:
Il est incapable de voler à haute altitude.
Il se déplace très vite pour protéger
son territoire.

pokemons.name: fearow
pokemons.quote:
With its huge and
magnificent wings,
it can keep aloft without ever
having to land
for rest.

pokemons.name: ekans
pokemons.quote:
Moves silently
and stealthily.
Eats the eggs of birds, such as
PIDGEY and
SPEAROW, whole.

pokemons.name: arbok
pokemons.quote:
It is rumored that
the ferocious
warning markings on its belly
differ from area
to area.

pokemons.name: pikachu
pokemons.quote:
最近發表了聚集大量皮卡丘
來建造發電廠的計畫。

pokemons.name: raichu
pokemons.quote:
Its tail discharges electricity into
the ground, protecting it from
getting shocked.

pokemons.name: sandshrew
pokemons.quote:
Burrows deep
underground in
arid locations far from water.
It only emerges
to hunt for food.

pokemons.name: sandslash
pokemons.quote:
Curls up into a
spiny ball when
threatened. It can roll while
curled up to
attack or escape.

pokemons.name: nidoran-f
pokemons.quote:
Although small,
its venomous
barbs render this POKéMON dangerous.
The female has
smaller horns.

pokemons.name: nidorina
pokemons.quote:
The female's horn
develops slowly.
Prefers physical attacks such as
clawing and
biting.

pokemons.name: nidoqueen
pokemons.quote:
Its hard scales
provide strong
protection. It uses its hefty
bulk to execute
powerful moves.

pokemons.name: nidoran-m
pokemons.quote:
Saca las orejas por encima de la hierba para explorar
el territorio. Le protege su cuerno venenoso.

pokemons.name: nidorino
pokemons.quote:
An aggressive
POKéMON that is
quick to attack. The horn on its
head secretes a
powerful venom.

pokemons.name: nidoking
pokemons.quote:
One swing of its mighty tail can
snap a telephone pole as if it were
a matchstick.

pokemons.name: clefairy
pokemons.quote:
Its magical and
cute appeal has
many admirers. It is rare and
found only in
certain areas.

pokemons.name: clefable
pokemons.quote:
A timid fairy
POKéMON that is
rarely seen. It will run and hide
the moment it
senses people.

pokemons.name: vulpix
pokemons.quote:
At the time of
birth, it has
just one tail. The tail splits
from its tip as
it grows older.

pokemons.name: ninetales
pokemons.quote:
Very smart and
very vengeful.
Grabbing one of its many tails
could result in a
1000-year curse.

pokemons.name: jigglypuff
pokemons.quote:
When its huge eyes
light up, it sings
a mysteriously soothing melody
that lulls its
enemies to sleep.

pokemons.name: wigglytuff
pokemons.quote:
The body is soft
and rubbery. When
angered, it will suck in air and
inflate itself to
an enormous size.

pokemons.name: zubat
pokemons.quote:
Forms colonies in
perpetually dark
places. Uses ultrasonic waves
to identify and
approach targets.

pokemons.name: golbat
pokemons.quote:
Once it strikes,
it will not stop
draining energy from the victim
even if it gets
too heavy to fly.

pokemons.name: oddish
pokemons.quote:
During the day,
it keeps its face
buried in the ground. At night,
it wanders around
sowing its seeds.

pokemons.name: gloom
pokemons.quote:
It secretes a
sticky, drool-like
honey. Although sweet, it smells
too repulsive to
get very close.

pokemons.name: vileplume
pokemons.quote:
It has the world's
largest petals.
With every step, the petals shake
out heavy clouds
of toxic pollen.

pokemons.name: paras
pokemons.quote:
Burrows to suck
tree roots. The
mushrooms on its back grow by draw­
ing nutrients from
the bug host.

pokemons.name: parasect
pokemons.quote:
A host-parasite
pair in which the
parasite mushroom has taken over the
host bug. Prefers
damp places.

pokemons.name: venonat
pokemons.quote:
Lives in the
shadows of tall
trees where it eats insects. It
is attracted by
light at night.

pokemons.name: venomoth
pokemons.quote:
The dust-like
scales covering
its wings are color coded to
indicate the kinds
of poison it has.

pokemons.name: diglett
pokemons.quote:
Lives about one
yard underground
where it feeds on plant roots. It
sometimes appears
above ground.

pokemons.name: dugtrio
pokemons.quote:
A team of DIGLETT
triplets.
It triggers huge earthquakes by
burrowing 60 miles
underground.

pokemons.name: meowth
pokemons.quote:
Es de naturaleza nocturna. Le atraen los objetos
brillantes.

pokemons.name: persian
pokemons.quote:
Although its fur
has many admirers,
it is tough to raise as a pet
because of its
fickle meanness.

pokemons.name: psyduck
pokemons.quote:
While lulling its
enemies with its
vacant look, this wily POKéMON will
use psychokinetic
powers.

pokemons.name: golduck
pokemons.quote:
Often seen swim­
ming elegantly by
lake shores. It is often mistaken
for the Japanese
monster, Kappa.

pokemons.name: mankey
pokemons.quote:
Extremely quick to
anger. It could
be docile one moment then
thrashing away
the next instant.

pokemons.name: primeape
pokemons.quote:
Always furious
and tenacious to
boot. It will not abandon chasing
its quarry until
it is caught.

pokemons.name: growlithe
pokemons.quote:
Very protective
of its territory.
It will bark and bite to repel
intruders from
its space.

pokemons.name: arcanine
pokemons.quote:
A POKéMON that
has been admired
since the past for its beauty.
It runs agilely
as if on wings.

pokemons.name: poliwag
pokemons.quote:
Its newly grown
legs prevent it
from running. It appears to prefer
swimming than
trying to stand.

pokemons.name: poliwhirl
pokemons.quote:
Capable of living
in or out of
water. When out of water, it
sweats to keep
its body slimy.

pokemons.name: poliwrath
pokemons.quote:
An adept swimmer
at both the front
crawl and breast stroke. Easily
overtakes the best
human swimmers.

pokemons.name: abra
pokemons.quote:
Dieses Pokémon schläft 18 Stunden am Tag.
Bei Gefahr teleportiert es sich in Sicherheit,
ohne dabei aufzuwachen.

pokemons.name: kadabra
pokemons.quote:
It emits special
alpha waves from
its body that induce headaches
just by being
close by.

pokemons.name: alakazam
pokemons.quote:
Its brain can out­
perform a super­
computer. Its intelligence
quotient is said
to be 5,000.

pokemons.name: machop
pokemons.quote:
Loves to build
its muscles.
It trains in all styles of martial
arts to become
even stronger.

pokemons.name: machoke
pokemons.quote:
Its muscular body
is so powerful, it
must wear a power save belt to be
able to regulate
its motions.

pokemons.name: machamp
pokemons.quote:
Using its heavy
muscles, it throws
powerful punches that can send the
victim clear over
the horizon.

pokemons.name: bellsprout
pokemons.quote:
Even though its body is extremely
skinny, it is blindingly fast
when catching its prey.

pokemons.name: weepinbell
pokemons.quote:
Escupe Polvo Veneno para envenenar al enemigo y,
luego, lo liquida con Ácido.

pokemons.name: victreebel
pokemons.quote:
Said to live in
huge colonies
deep in jungles, although no one
has ever returned
from there.

pokemons.name: tentacool
pokemons.quote:
Son corps est principalement composé d’eau.
Ses yeux cristallins projettent d’étranges rayons.

pokemons.name: tentacruel
pokemons.quote:
80개의 촉수를 자유롭게
움직인다. 찔리면 독이 퍼져
극심한 고통을 겪게 된다.

pokemons.name: geodude
pokemons.quote:
Found in fields
and mountains.
Mistaking them for boulders,
people often step
or trip on them.

pokemons.name: graveler
pokemons.quote:
Rolls down slopes
to move. It rolls
over any obstacle without slowing
or changing its
direction.

pokemons.name: golem
pokemons.quote:
Its boulder-like
body is extremely
hard. It can easily withstand
dynamite blasts
without damage.

pokemons.name: ponyta
pokemons.quote:
Its hooves are 10
times harder than
diamonds. It can trample anything
completely flat
in little time.

pokemons.name: rapidash
pokemons.quote:
Very competitive,
this POKéMON will
chase anything that moves fast
in the hopes of
racing it.

pokemons.name: slowpoke
pokemons.quote:
Incredibly slow
and dopey. It
takes 5 seconds for it to feel
pain when under
attack.

pokemons.name: slowbro
pokemons.quote:
The SHELLDER that
is latched onto
SLOWPOKE's tail is said to feed
on the host's left
over scraps.

pokemons.name: magnemite
pokemons.quote:
Uses anti-gravity
to stay suspended.
Appears without warning and uses
THUNDER WAVE and
similar moves.

pokemons.name: magneton
pokemons.quote:
Formed by several
MAGNEMITEs linked
together. They frequently appear
when sunspots
flare up.

pokemons.name: farfetchd
pokemons.quote:
The sprig of
green onions it
holds is its weapon. It is
used much like a
metal sword.

pokemons.name: doduo
pokemons.quote:
A bird that makes
up for its poor
flying with its fast foot speed.
Leaves giant
footprints.

pokemons.name: dodrio
pokemons.quote:
Uses its three
brains to execute
complex plans. While two heads
sleep, one head
stays awake.

pokemons.name: seel
pokemons.quote:
The protruding
horn on its head
is very hard. It is used for
bashing through
thick ice.

pokemons.name: dewgong
pokemons.quote:
Stores thermal
energy in its
body. Swims at a steady 8 knots
even in intensely
cold waters.

pokemons.name: grimer
pokemons.quote:
Appears in filthy
areas. Thrives by
sucking up polluted sludge
that is pumped
out of factories.

pokemons.name: muk
pokemons.quote:
Thickly covered
with a filthy,
vile sludge. It is so toxic, even
its footprints
contain poison.

pokemons.name: shellder
pokemons.quote:
Its hard shell
repels any kind
of attack. It is vulnerable
only when its
shell is open.

pokemons.name: cloyster
pokemons.quote:
CLOYSTER that live
in seas with harsh
tidal currents grow large, sharp
spikes on their
shells.

pokemons.name: gastly
pokemons.quote:
Almost invisible,
this gaseous
POKéMON cloaks the target and
puts it to sleep
without notice.

pokemons.name: haunter
pokemons.quote:
Because of its
ability to slip
through block walls, it is said
to be from an­
other dimension.

pokemons.name: gengar
pokemons.quote:
Under a full moon,
this POKéMON
likes to mimic the shadows of
people and laugh
at their fright.

pokemons.name: onix
pokemons.quote:
As it grows, the
stone portions of
its body harden to become similar
to a diamond, but
colored black.

pokemons.name: drowzee
pokemons.quote:
Puts enemies to
sleep then eats
their dreams. Occasionally gets
sick from eating
bad dreams.

pokemons.name: hypno
pokemons.quote:
When it locks eyes
with an enemy, it
will use a mix of PSI moves such as
HYPNOSIS and
CONFUSION.

pokemons.name: krabby
pokemons.quote:
Its pincers are
not only powerful
weapons, they are used for balance
when walking
sideways.

pokemons.name: kingler
pokemons.quote:
The large pincer
has 10000 hp of
crushing power. However, its huge
size makes it
unwieldy to use.

pokemons.name: voltorb
pokemons.quote:
Usually found in
power plants.
Easily mistaken for a POKé BALL,
they have zapped
many people.

pokemons.name: electrode
pokemons.quote:
It stores electric
energy under very
high pressure. It often explodes
with little or no
provocation.

pokemons.name: exeggcute
pokemons.quote:
Often mistaken
for eggs.
When disturbed, they quickly
gather and attack
in swarms.

pokemons.name: exeggutor
pokemons.quote:
Legend has it that
on rare occasions,
one of its heads will drop off and
continue on as an
EXEGGCUTE.

pokemons.name: cubone
pokemons.quote:
死に別れた　母親の　骨を
頭に　覆っている。寂しいとき
大声で　泣くという。

pokemons.name: marowak
pokemons.quote:
骨に　灯った　呪いの　炎は
いつまでも　治らない　痛みを
体と　心に　残すという。

pokemons.name: hitmonlee
pokemons.quote:
When in a hurry,
its legs lengthen
progressively. It runs smoothly
with extra long,
loping strides.

pokemons.name: hitmonchan
pokemons.quote:
While apparently
doing nothing, it
fires punches in lightning fast
volleys that are
impossible to see.

pokemons.name: lickitung
pokemons.quote:
Its tongue can be
extended like a
chameleon's. It leaves a tingling
sensation when it
licks enemies.

pokemons.name: koffing
pokemons.quote:
Because it stores
several kinds of
toxic gases in its body, it is
prone to exploding
without warning.

pokemons.name: weezing
pokemons.quote:
Where two kinds
of poison gases
meet, 2 KOFFINGs can fuse into a
WEEZING over many
years.

pokemons.name: rhyhorn
pokemons.quote:
Its massive bones
are 1000 times
harder than human bones. It can
easily knock a
trailer flying.

pokemons.name: rhydon
pokemons.quote:
Protected by an
armor-like hide,
it is capable of living in molten
lava of 3,600
degrees.

pokemons.name: chansey
pokemons.quote:
A rare and elusive
POKéMON that is
said to bring happiness to those
who manage to get
it.

pokemons.name: tangela
pokemons.quote:
The whole body is
swathed with wide
vines that are similar to sea­
weed. Its vines
shake as it walks.

pokemons.name: kangaskhan
pokemons.quote:
The infant rarely
ventures out of
its mother's protective pouch
until it is 3
years old.

pokemons.name: horsea
pokemons.quote:
Hace su nido entre los corales. Si se siente en peligro,
escupe tinta y huye.

pokemons.name: seadra
pokemons.quote:
Capable of swim­
ming backwards by
rapidly flapping its wing-like
pectoral fins and
stout tail.

pokemons.name: goldeen
pokemons.quote:
せびれ　むなびれ　おびれが
ゆうがに　たなびくので
みずのおどりこ　とよばれる。

pokemons.name: seaking
pokemons.quote:
In the autumn
spawning season,
they can be seen swimming power­
fully up rivers
and creeks.

pokemons.name: staryu
pokemons.quote:
An enigmatic
POKéMON that can
effortlessly regenerate any
appendage it
loses in battle.

pokemons.name: starmie
pokemons.quote:
Its central core
glows with the
seven colors of the rainbow. Some
people value the
core as a gem.

pokemons.name: mr-mime
pokemons.quote:
If interrupted
while it is
miming, it will slap around the
offender with its
broad hands.

pokemons.name: scyther
pokemons.quote:
With ninja-like
agility and speed,
it can create the illusion that
there is more
than one.

pokemons.name: jynx
pokemons.quote:
Its cries sound like human speech.
However, it is impossible to tell
what it is trying to say.

pokemons.name: electabuzz
pokemons.quote:
Normally found
near power plants,
they can wander away and cause
major blackouts
in cities.

pokemons.name: magmar
pokemons.quote:
Its body always
burns with an
orange glow that enables it to
hide perfectly
among flames.

pokemons.name: pinsir
pokemons.quote:
If it fails to
crush the victim
in its pincers, it will swing it
around and toss
it hard.

pokemons.name: tauros
pokemons.quote:
When it targets
an enemy, it
charges furiously while whipping its
body with its
long tails.

pokemons.name: magikarp
pokemons.quote:
In the distant
past, it was
somewhat stronger than the horribly
weak descendants
that exist today.

pokemons.name: gyarados
pokemons.quote:
Rarely seen in
the wild. Huge
and vicious, it is capable of
destroying entire
cities in a rage.

pokemons.name: lapras
pokemons.quote:
A POKéMON that
has been over­
hunted almost to extinction. It
can ferry people
across the water.

pokemons.name: ditto
pokemons.quote:
It can freely recombine its own cellular structure to
transform into other life-forms.

pokemons.name: eevee
pokemons.quote:
Its genetic code
is irregular.
It may mutate if it is exposed to
radiation from
element STONEs.

pokemons.name: vaporeon
pokemons.quote:
수중에서의 생활에 적합한
몸으로 진화했다.
물에 녹으면 보이지 않게 된다.

pokemons.name: jolteon
pokemons.quote:
It accumulates
negative ions in
the atmosphere to blast out 10000-
volt lightning
bolts.

pokemons.name: flareon
pokemons.quote:
When storing
thermal energy in
its body, its temperature could
soar to over 1600
degrees.

pokemons.name: porygon
pokemons.quote:
A POKéMON that
consists entirely
of programming code. Capable of
moving freely in
cyberspace.

pokemons.name: omanyte
pokemons.quote:
Although long
extinct, in rare
cases, it can be genetically
resurrected from
fossils.

pokemons.name: omastar
pokemons.quote:
Apparently, it
cracked SHELLDER's
shell with its sharp fangs and
sucked out the
insides.

pokemons.name: kabuto
pokemons.quote:
A POKéMON that
was resurrected
from a fossil found in what was
once the ocean
floor eons ago.

pokemons.name: kabutops
pokemons.quote:
Its sleek shape is
perfect for swim­
ming. It slashes prey with its
claws and drains
the body fluids.

pokemons.name: aerodactyl
pokemons.quote:
A ferocious, pre­
historic POKéMON
that goes for the enemy's throat
with its serrated
saw-like fangs.

pokemons.name: snorlax
pokemons.quote:
Very lazy. Just
eats and sleeps.
As its rotund bulk builds, it
becomes steadily
more slothful.

pokemons.name: articuno
pokemons.quote:
A legendary bird
POKéMON that is
said to appear to doomed people who
are lost in icy
mountains.

pokemons.name: zapdos
pokemons.quote:
A legendary bird
POKéMON that is
said to appear from clouds while
dropping enormous
lightning bolts.

pokemons.name: moltres
pokemons.quote:
It is said to be the legendary bird Pokémon of fire.
Every flap of its wings creates a dazzling flare
of flames.

pokemons.name: dratini
pokemons.quote:
Long considered a
mythical POKéMON
until recently when a small
colony was found
living underwater.

pokemons.name: dragonair
pokemons.quote:
A mystical POKéMON
that exudes a
gentle aura. Has the ability
to change climate
conditions.

pokemons.name: dragonite
pokemons.quote:
An extremely
rarely seen
marine POKéMON. Its intelligence
is said to match
that of humans.

pokemons.name: mewtwo
pokemons.quote:
It was created by
a scientist after
years of horrific gene splicing and
DNA engineering
experiments.

pokemons.name: mew
pokemons.quote:
So rare that it
is still said to
be a mirage by many experts. Only
a few people have
seen it worldwide.

pokemons.name: chikorita
pokemons.quote:
A sweet aroma
gently wafts from
the leaf on its head. It is docile
and loves to soak
up the sun's rays.

pokemons.name: bayleef
pokemons.quote:
Die Knospen an seinem Hals geben ein
würziges Aroma ab, das andere aufheitert.

pokemons.name: meganium
pokemons.quote:
The aroma that
rises from its
petals contains a substance that
calms aggressive
feelings.

pokemons.name: cyndaquil
pokemons.quote:
It is timid, and
always curls it­
self up in a ball. If attacked, it
flares up its back
for protection.

pokemons.name: quilava
pokemons.quote:
Be careful if it
turns its back
during battle. It means that it will
attack with the
fire on its back.

pokemons.name: typhlosion
pokemons.quote:
If its rage peaks,
it becomes so hot
that anything that touches it will
instantly go
up in flames.

pokemons.name: totodile
pokemons.quote:
Its well-developed
jaws are powerful
and capable of crushing anything.
Even its trainer
must be careful.

pokemons.name: croconaw
pokemons.quote:
If it loses a
fang, a new one
grows back in its place. There are
always 48 fangs
lining its mouth.

pokemons.name: feraligatr
pokemons.quote:
When it bites with
its massive and
powerful jaws, it shakes its head
and savagely tears
its victim up.

pokemons.name: sentret
pokemons.quote:
A very cautious
POKéMON, it raises
itself up using its tail to get a
better view of its
surroundings.

pokemons.name: furret
pokemons.quote:
The mother puts its offspring to
sleep by curling up around them.
It corners foes with speed.

pokemons.name: hoothoot
pokemons.quote:
It always stands on one foot.
It changes feet so fast,
the movement can rarely be seen.

pokemons.name: noctowl
pokemons.quote:
Its eyes are
specially adapted.
They concentrate even faint light
and enable it to
see in the dark.

pokemons.name: ledyba
pokemons.quote:
It is very timid.
It will be afraid
to move if it is alone. But it will
be active if it is
in a group.

pokemons.name: ledian
pokemons.quote:
When the stars
flicker in the
night sky, it flutters about,
scattering a
glowing powder.

pokemons.name: spinarak
pokemons.quote:
It lies still in
the same pose for
days in its web, waiting for its
unsuspecting prey
to wander close.

pokemons.name: ariados
pokemons.quote:
It spins string
not only from its
rear but also from its mouth. It is
hard to tell which
end is which.

pokemons.name: crobat
pokemons.quote:
It flies so si­
lently through the
dark on its four wings that it may
not be noticed
even when nearby.

pokemons.name: chinchou
pokemons.quote:
It shoots positive
and negative elec­
tricity between the tips of its
two antennae and
zaps its enemies.

pokemons.name: lanturn
pokemons.quote:
The light it emits
is so bright that
it can illuminate the sea's surface
from a depth of
over three miles.

pokemons.name: pichu
pokemons.quote:
It is not yet
skilled at storing
electricity. It may send out a
jolt if amused
or startled.

pokemons.name: cleffa
pokemons.quote:
Si dice che sia facile incontrarlo dove sono
precipitate delle stelle cadenti.

pokemons.name: igglybuff
pokemons.quote:
It has a very soft
body. If it starts
to roll, it will bounce all over
and be impossible
to stop.

pokemons.name: togepi
pokemons.quote:
The shell seems to
be filled with
joy. It is said that it will share
good luck when
treated kindly.

pokemons.name: togetic
pokemons.quote:
They say that it
will appear before
kindhearted, car­ ing people and
shower them with
happiness.

pokemons.name: natu
pokemons.quote:
Because its wings
aren't yet fully
grown, it has to hop to get around.
It is always star­
ing at something.

pokemons.name: xatu
pokemons.quote:
They say that it
stays still and
quiet because it is seeing both the
past and future at
the same time.

pokemons.name: mareep
pokemons.quote:
If static elec­
tricity builds in
its body, its fleece doubles in
volume. Touching
it will shock you.

pokemons.name: flaaffy
pokemons.quote:
As a result of
storing too much
electricity, it developed patches
where even downy
wool won't grow.

pokemons.name: ampharos
pokemons.quote:
The tail's tip
shines brightly
and can be seen from far away. It
acts as a beacon
for lost people.

pokemons.name: bellossom
pokemons.quote:
BELLOSSOM gather
at times and
appear to dance. They say that the
dance is a ritual
to summon the sun.

pokemons.name: marill
pokemons.quote:
The tip of its
tail, which con­
tains oil that is lighter than wa­
ter, lets it swim
without drowning.

pokemons.name: azumarill
pokemons.quote:
会制作填满空气的泡泡。
当露力丽在河里玩的时候，
它就会用这个泡泡包住露力丽。

pokemons.name: sudowoodo
pokemons.quote:
Although it always
pretends to be a
tree, its composi­ tion appears to be
closer to a rock
than a plant.

pokemons.name: politoed
pokemons.quote:
울음소리가 울려 퍼지면
여기저기에서 발챙이와
슈륙챙이들이 모인다.

pokemons.name: hoppip
pokemons.quote:
To keep from being
blown away by the
wind, they gather in clusters. They
do enjoy gentle
breezes, though.

pokemons.name: skiploom
pokemons.quote:
The bloom on top
of its head opens
and closes as the temperature fluc­
tuates up and
down.

pokemons.name: jumpluff
pokemons.quote:
Once it catches
the wind, it deft­
ly controls its cotton-puff spores
to float, even
around the world.

pokemons.name: aipom
pokemons.quote:
Its tail is so
powerful that it
can use it to grab a tree branch and
hold itself up in
the air.

pokemons.name: sunkern
pokemons.quote:
It may drop out of
the sky suddenly.
If attacked by a SPEAROW, it will
violently shake
its leaves.

pokemons.name: sunflora
pokemons.quote:
태양 에너지에서 영양을 만들어낸다.
기온이 높은 낮에는 활발하게 움직이고
태양이 지면 뚝 하니 움직이지 않게 된다.

pokemons.name: yanma
pokemons.quote:
If it flaps its
wings really fast,
it can generate shock waves that
will shatter win­
dows in the area.

pokemons.name: wooper
pokemons.quote:
This POKéMON lives
in cold water. It
will leave the water to search
for food when it
gets cold outside.

pokemons.name: quagsire
pokemons.quote:
This carefree
POKéMON has an
easy-going nature. While swimming, it
always bumps into
boat hulls.

pokemons.name: espeon
pokemons.quote:
It uses the fine
hair that covers
its body to sense air currents and
predict its ene­
my's actions.

pokemons.name: umbreon
pokemons.quote:
When agitated,
this POKéMON pro­
tects itself by spraying poisonous
sweat from its
pores.

pokemons.name: murkrow
pokemons.quote:
Feared and loathed
by many, it is
believed to bring misfortune to all
those who see it
at night.

pokemons.name: slowking
pokemons.quote:
It has incredible
intellect and in­
tuition. Whatever the situation, it
remains calm and
collected.

pokemons.name: misdreavus
pokemons.quote:
It likes playing
mischievous tricks
such as screaming and wailing to
startle people at
night.

pokemons.name: unown
pokemons.quote:
Its flat, thin body is always
stuck on walls. Its shape appears
to have some meaning.

pokemons.name: wobbuffet
pokemons.quote:
It hates light and
shock. If attack­
ed, it inflates its body to pump
up its counter­
strike.

pokemons.name: girafarig
pokemons.quote:
Its tail has a
small brain of its
own. Beware! If you get close, it
may react to your
scent and bite.

pokemons.name: pineco
pokemons.quote:
It likes to make
its shell thicker
by adding layers of tree bark. The
additional weight
doesn't bother it.

pokemons.name: forretress
pokemons.quote:
Its entire body is
shielded by a
steel-hard shell. What lurks inside
the armor is a
total mystery.

pokemons.name: dunsparce
pokemons.quote:
DUNSPARCE has a drill for its tail.
It uses this tail to burrow into the
ground backwards. This POKéMON is known to make its nest
in complex shapes deep under the
ground.

pokemons.name: gligar
pokemons.quote:
It flies straight at its target’s face,
then clamps down on the startled
victim to inject poison.

pokemons.name: steelix
pokemons.quote:
Its body has been
compressed deep
under the ground. As a result, it is
even harder than a
diamond.

pokemons.name: snubbull
pokemons.quote:
Although it looks
frightening, it is
actually kind and affectionate. It
is very popular
among women.

pokemons.name: granbull
pokemons.quote:
It is actually
timid and easily
spooked. If at­ tacked, it flails
about to fend off
its attacker.

pokemons.name: qwilfish
pokemons.quote:
To fire its poison
spikes, it must
inflate its body by drinking over
2.6 gallons of
water all at once.

pokemons.name: scizor
pokemons.quote:
It swings its eye-
patterned pincers
up to scare its foes. This makes
it look like it
has three heads.

pokemons.name: shuckle
pokemons.quote:
The BERRIES it
stores in its
vase-like shell decompose and
become a gooey
liquid.

pokemons.name: heracross
pokemons.quote:
This powerful
POKéMON thrusts
its prized horn under its enemies’
bellies then lifts
and throws them.

pokemons.name: sneasel
pokemons.quote:
Its paws conceal
sharp claws. If
attacked, it sud­ denly extends the
claws and startles
its enemy.

pokemons.name: teddiursa
pokemons.quote:
If it finds honey,
its crescent mark
glows. It always licks its paws
because they are
soaked with honey.

pokemons.name: ursaring
pokemons.quote:
Avec sa capacité à sentir toute odeur, il trouve sans
faillir de la nourriture enfouie dans le sol.

pokemons.name: slugma
pokemons.quote:
Son corps est fait de magma.
S’il cesse de bouger, il refroidit
et durcit.

pokemons.name: magcargo
pokemons.quote:
The shell on its
back is just skin
that has cooled and hardened. It
breaks easily with
a slight touch.

pokemons.name: swinub
pokemons.quote:
It rubs its snout
on the ground to
find and dig up food. It sometimes
discovers hot
springs.

pokemons.name: piloswine
pokemons.quote:
Because the long
hair all over its
body obscures its sight, it just
keeps charging
repeatedly.

pokemons.name: corsola
pokemons.quote:
It continuously
sheds and grows.
The tip of its head is prized as
a treasure for its
beauty.

pokemons.name: remoraid
pokemons.quote:
It squirts water forcefully from
its mouth to shoot down flying
prey.

pokemons.name: octillery
pokemons.quote:
It traps enemies
with its suction-
cupped tentacles then smashes them
with its rock-hard
head.

pokemons.name: delibird
pokemons.quote:
It carries food
all day long.
There are tales about lost people
who were saved by
the food it had.

pokemons.name: mantine
pokemons.quote:
As it majestically
swims, it doesn't
care if REMORAID attach to it for
scavenging its
leftovers.

pokemons.name: skarmory
pokemons.quote:
全身披著鋼鐵鎧甲。
看起來很重，但牠能以
最高３００公里的時速飛行。

pokemons.name: houndour
pokemons.quote:
It uses different
kinds of cries for
communicating with others of its kind
and for pursuing
its prey.

pokemons.name: houndoom
pokemons.quote:
If you are burned
by the flames it
shoots from its mouth, the pain
will never go
away.

pokemons.name: kingdra
pokemons.quote:
Dicen que suele esconderse en cuevas submarinas.
Puede crear torbellinos al bostezar.

pokemons.name: phanpy
pokemons.quote:
It swings its long
snout around play­
fully, but because it is so strong,
that can be dan­
gerous.

pokemons.name: donphan
pokemons.quote:
It has sharp, hard
tusks and a rugged
hide. Its TACKLE is strong enough
to knock down a
house.

pokemons.name: porygon2
pokemons.quote:
This upgraded
version of PORYGON
is designed for space exploration.
It can't fly,
though.

pokemons.name: stantler
pokemons.quote:
Those who stare at its antlers will
gradually lose control of their
senses and be unable to stand.

pokemons.name: smeargle
pokemons.quote:
A special fluid
oozes from the tip
of its tail. It paints the fluid
everywhere to mark
its territory.

pokemons.name: tyrogue
pokemons.quote:
It is always
bursting with en­
ergy. To make it­ self stronger, it
keeps on fighting
even if it loses.

pokemons.name: hitmontop
pokemons.quote:
Si te encantan sus suaves, elegantes y danzarinas
patadas, acabarás taladrado.

pokemons.name: smoochum
pokemons.quote:
Its lips are the
most sensitive
parts on its body. It always uses its
lips first to
examine things.

pokemons.name: elekid
pokemons.quote:
It generates electricity by whirling its arms.
However, it can’t store the energy it makes.

pokemons.name: magby
pokemons.quote:
Each and every
time it inhales
and exhales, hot embers dribble out
of its mouth and
nostrils.

pokemons.name: miltank
pokemons.quote:
Its milk is packed
with nutrition,
making it the ultimate beverage
for the sick or
weary.

pokemons.name: blissey
pokemons.quote:
Anyone who takes
even one bite of
BLISSEY's egg be­ comes unfailingly
caring and pleas­
ant to everyone.

pokemons.name: raikou
pokemons.quote:
The rain clouds it
carries let it
fire thunderbolts at will. They say
that it descended
with lightning.

pokemons.name: entei
pokemons.quote:
Volcanoes erupt
when it barks. Un­
able to restrain its extreme power,
it races headlong
around the land.

pokemons.name: suicune
pokemons.quote:
Said to be the
reincarnation of
north winds, it can instantly
purify filthy,
murky water.

pokemons.name: larvitar
pokemons.quote:
It feeds on soil.
After it has eaten
a large mountain, it will fall
asleep so it can
grow.

pokemons.name: pupitar
pokemons.quote:
Its shell is as
hard as sheet
rock, and it is also very strong.
Its THRASHING can
topple a mountain.

pokemons.name: tyranitar
pokemons.quote:
Its body can't be
harmed by any sort
of attack, so it is very eager to
make challenges
against enemies.

pokemons.name: lugia
pokemons.quote:
It is said that it
quietly spends its
time deep at the bottom of the sea
because its powers
are too strong.

pokemons.name: ho-oh
pokemons.quote:
Legends claim this
POKéMON flies the
world's skies con­ tinuously on its
magnificent seven-
colored wings.

pokemons.name: celebi
pokemons.quote:
This POKéMON wan­
ders across time.
Grass and trees flourish in the
forests in which
it has appeared.

pokemons.name: treecko
pokemons.quote:
TREECKO has small hooks on the bottom
of its feet that enable it to scale
vertical walls. This POKéMON attacks by slamming foes
with its thick tail.

pokemons.name: grovyle
pokemons.quote:
발달한 넓적다리의 근육이
경이로운 순발력과
도약력을 만들어 낸다.

pokemons.name: sceptile
pokemons.quote:
The leaves growing on SCEPTILE’s body
are very sharp edged. This POKéMON is
very agile - it leaps all over the branches of trees and jumps on its foe
from above or behind.

pokemons.name: torchic
pokemons.quote:
TORCHIC sticks with its TRAINER,
following behind with unsteady
steps. This POKéMON breathes fire of over
1,800 degrees F, including fireballs
that leave the foe scorched black.

pokemons.name: combusken
pokemons.quote:
COMBUSKEN toughens up its legs and
thighs by running through fields and
mountains. This POKéMON’s legs possess both speed
and power, enabling it to dole out ten
kicks in one second.

pokemons.name: blaziken
pokemons.quote:
In battle, BLAZIKEN blows out intense
flames from its wrists and attacks foes
courageously. The stronger the foe, the more
intensely this POKéMON’s wrists burn.

pokemons.name: mudkip
pokemons.quote:
The fin on MUDKIP’s head acts as highly
sensitive radar. Using this fin to sense
movements of water and air, this POKéMON can determine what is taking
place around it without using its eyes.

pokemons.name: marshtomp
pokemons.quote:
The surface of MARSHTOMP’s body is
enveloped by a thin, sticky film that
enables it to live on land. This POKéMON plays in mud on beaches
when the ocean tide is low.

pokemons.name: swampert
pokemons.quote:
SWAMPERT is very strong. It has enough
power to easily drag a boulder weighing
more than a ton. This POKéMON also has powerful vision
that lets it see even in murky water.

pokemons.name: poochyena
pokemons.quote:
At first sight, POOCHYENA takes a bite
at anything that moves.
This POKéMON chases after prey until the victim becomes exhausted.
However, it may turn tail if the prey
strikes back.

pokemons.name: mightyena
pokemons.quote:
Les Grahyèna forment des meutes de dix qui
excellent au travail de groupe pour capturer leurs
proies.

pokemons.name: zigzagoon
pokemons.quote:
ZIGZAGOON restlessly wanders
everywhere at all times. This POKéMON
does so because it is very curious. It becomes interested in anything
that it happens to see.

pokemons.name: linoone
pokemons.quote:
LINOONE always runs full speed and only
in straight lines. If facing an obstacle,
it makes a right-angle turn to evade it. This POKéMON is very challenged by
gently curving roads.

pokemons.name: wurmple
pokemons.quote:
Using the spikes on its rear end,  
WURMPLE peels the bark off trees and
feeds on the sap that oozes out. This POKéMON’s feet are tipped with
suction pads that allow it to cling to
glass without slipping.

pokemons.name: silcoon
pokemons.quote:
SILCOON tethers itself to a tree branch
using silk to keep from falling. There, 
this POKéMON hangs quietly while it awaits evolution.
It peers out of the silk cocoon through
a small hole.

pokemons.name: beautifly
pokemons.quote:
BEAUTIFLY’s favorite food is the sweet
pollen of flowers. If you want to see
this POKéMON, just leave a potted flower by an open window. BEAUTIFLY
is sure to come looking for pollen.

pokemons.name: cascoon
pokemons.quote:
CASCOON makes its protective cocoon
by wrapping its body entirely with a
fine silk from its mouth. Once the silk goes around its body, it hardens.
This POKéMON prepares for its evolution
inside the cocoon.

pokemons.name: dustox
pokemons.quote:
DUSTOX is instinctively drawn to light.
Swarms of this POKéMON are attracted
by the bright lights of cities, where they wreak havoc by stripping the
leaves off roadside trees for food.

pokemons.name: lotad
pokemons.quote:
LOTAD live in ponds and lakes, where
they float on the surface.
It grows weak if its broad leaf dies. On rare occasions, this POKéMON travels
on land in search of clean water.

pokemons.name: lombre
pokemons.quote:
Vive en el agua y, cuando hace sol, se queda en la
orilla. De día duerme sobre las algas y de noche entra
en acción.

pokemons.name: ludicolo
pokemons.quote:
LUDICOLO begins dancing as soon as
it hears cheerful, festive music.
This POKéMON is said to appear when it hears the singing of children on hiking
outings.

pokemons.name: seedot
pokemons.quote:
SEEDOT attaches itself to a tree
branch using the top of its head.
It sucks moisture from the tree while hanging off the branch.
The more water it drinks, the glossier
this POKéMON’s body becomes.

pokemons.name: nuzleaf
pokemons.quote:
NUZLEAF live in densely overgrown
forests. They occasionally venture out
of the forest to startle people. This POKéMON dislikes having its long
nose pinched.

pokemons.name: shiftry
pokemons.quote:
SHIFTRY is a mysterious POKéMON that
is said to live atop towering trees 
dating back over a thousand years. It creates terrific windstorms with
the fans it holds.

pokemons.name: taillow
pokemons.quote:
TAILLOW courageously stands its
ground against foes, however strong
they may be. This gutsy POKéMON will remain defiant
even after a loss. On the other hand,
it cries loudly if it becomes hungry.

pokemons.name: swellow
pokemons.quote:
SWELLOW flies high above our heads,
making graceful arcs in the sky.
This POKéMON dives at a steep angle as soon as it spots its prey. The hapless
prey is tightly grasped by SWELLOW’s
clawed feet, preventing escape.

pokemons.name: wingull
pokemons.quote:
在海邊的懸崖上築巢。
會在海上盤旋，尋找牠
最愛吃的弱丁魚。

pokemons.name: pelipper
pokemons.quote:
PELIPPER is a flying transporter that
carries small POKéMON and eggs inside
its massive bill. This POKéMON builds its nest on steep
cliffs facing the sea.

pokemons.name: ralts
pokemons.quote:
RALTS senses the emotions of
people using the horns on its head.
This POKéMON rarely appears before people. But when it does, it draws
closer if it senses that the person has
a positive disposition.

pokemons.name: kirlia
pokemons.quote:
It is said that a KIRLIA that is
exposed to the positive emotions of
its TRAINER grows beautiful. This POKéMON controls psychokinetic
powers with its highly developed brain.

pokemons.name: gardevoir
pokemons.quote:
GARDEVOIR has the ability to read the
future. If it senses impending danger
to its TRAINER, this POKéMON is said to unleash its psychokinetic energy at
full power.

pokemons.name: surskit
pokemons.quote:
From the tips of its feet, SURSKIT
secretes an oil that enables it to walk
on water as if it were skating. This POKéMON feeds on microscopic
organisms in ponds and lakes.

pokemons.name: masquerain
pokemons.quote:
MASQUERAIN intimidates enemies with
the eyelike patterns on its antennas.
This POKéMON flaps its four wings to freely fly in any direction - even
sideways and backwards - as if it were
a helicopter.

pokemons.name: shroomish
pokemons.quote:
SHROOMISH live in damp soil in the dark
depths of forests. They are often
found keeping still under fallen leaves. This POKéMON feeds on compost that
is made up of fallen, rotted leaves.

pokemons.name: breloom
pokemons.quote:
BRELOOM closes in on its foe with light
and sprightly footwork, then throws
punches with its stretchy arms. This POKéMON’s fighting technique puts
boxers to shame.

pokemons.name: slakoth
pokemons.quote:
SLAKOTH lolls around for over twenty
hours every day. Because it moves so
little, it does not need much food. This POKéMON’s sole daily meal consists
of just three leaves.

pokemons.name: vigoroth
pokemons.quote:
VIGOROTH is always itching and agitated
to go on a wild rampage. It simply can’t
tolerate sitting still for even a minute. This POKéMON’s stress level rises if it
can’t be moving constantly.

pokemons.name: slaking
pokemons.quote:
È il Pokémon più pigro del mondo, ma può sprigionare
di colpo una quantità spaventosa di energia a lungo
repressa.

pokemons.name: nincada
pokemons.quote:
有时能在土里生活１０年以上。
会从树木的根部那里吸取营养。

pokemons.name: ninjask
pokemons.quote:
NINJASK moves around at such a high
speed that it cannot be seen, even
while its crying can be clearly heard. For that reason, this POKéMON was long
believed to be invisible.

pokemons.name: shedinja
pokemons.quote:
A discarded bug shell that came to life. Peering into
the crack on its back is said to steal one’s spirit.

pokemons.name: whismur
pokemons.quote:
Normally, WHISMUR’s voice is very quiet -
it is barely audible even if one is
paying close attention. However, if this POKéMON senses danger,
it starts crying at an earsplitting
volume.

pokemons.name: loudred
pokemons.quote:
LOUDRED’s bellowing can completely
decimate a wood-frame house. It uses
its voice to punish its foes. This POKéMON’s round ears serve as
loudspeakers.

pokemons.name: exploud
pokemons.quote:
EXPLOUD triggers earthquakes with the
tremors it creates by bellowing. If this
POKéMON violently inhales from the ports on its body, it’s a sign that it is
preparing to let loose a huge bellow.

pokemons.name: makuhita
pokemons.quote:
MAKUHITA is tenacious - it will keep
getting up and attacking its foe
however many times it is knocked down. Every time it gets back up, this
POKéMON stores more energy in its body
for evolving.

pokemons.name: hariyama
pokemons.quote:
HARIYAMA practices its straight-arm
slaps in any number of locations.
One hit of this POKéMON’s powerful, openhanded, straight-arm punches
could snap a telephone pole in two.

pokemons.name: azurill
pokemons.quote:
AZURILL spins its tail as if it were a
lasso, then hurls it far. The momentum
of the throw sends its body flying, too. Using this unique action, one of these
POKéMON managed to hurl itself a record
33 feet.

pokemons.name: nosepass
pokemons.quote:
NOSEPASS’s magnetic nose is always
pointed to the north. If two of these
POKéMON meet, they cannot turn their faces to each other when they
are close because their magnetic noses
repel one another.

pokemons.name: skitty
pokemons.quote:
SKITTY has the habit of becoming
fascinated by moving objects and
chasing them around. This POKéMON is known to chase after
its own tail and become dizzy.

pokemons.name: delcatty
pokemons.quote:
DELCATTY prefers to live an unfettered
existence in which it can do as it
pleases at its own pace. Because this POKéMON eats and sleeps
whenever it decides, its daily routines
are completely random.

pokemons.name: sableye
pokemons.quote:
SABLEYE lead quiet lives deep inside
caverns. They are feared, however,
because these POKéMON are thought to steal the spirits of people when their
eyes burn with a sinister glow in the
darkness.

pokemons.name: mawile
pokemons.quote:
MAWHILE’s huge jaws are actually steel
horns that have been transformed.
Its docile-looking face serves to lull its foe into letting down its guard.
When the foe least expects it, MAWHILE
chomps it with its gaping jaws.

pokemons.name: aron
pokemons.quote:
This POKéMON has a body of steel.
To make its body, ARON feeds on
iron ore that it digs from mountains. Occasionally, it causes major trouble by
eating bridges and rails.

pokemons.name: lairon
pokemons.quote:
Il raffole du minerai de fer. Il défend son territoire
en chargeant avec son corps d’acier.

pokemons.name: aggron
pokemons.quote:
AGGRON claims an entire mountain as its
own territory. It mercilessly beats up
anything that violates its environment. This POKéMON vigilantly patrols its
territory at all times.

pokemons.name: meditite
pokemons.quote:
MEDITITE undertakes rigorous mental
training deep in the mountains.
However, whenever it meditates, this POKéMON always loses its concentration
and focus. As a result, its training
never ends.

pokemons.name: medicham
pokemons.quote:
It is said that through meditation,
MEDICHAM heightens energy inside
its body and sharpens its sixth sense. This POKéMON hides its presence by
merging itself with fields and
mountains.

pokemons.name: electrike
pokemons.quote:
ELECTRIKE stores electricity in its
long body hair. This POKéMON stimulates
its leg muscles with electric charges. These jolts of power give its legs
explosive acceleration performance.

pokemons.name: manectric
pokemons.quote:
It rarely appears before people.
It is said to nest where lightning has
fallen.

pokemons.name: plusle
pokemons.quote:
PLUSLE always acts as a cheerleader
for its partners. Whenever a teammate
puts out a good effort in battle, this POKéMON shorts out its body to create
the crackling noises of sparks to show
its joy.

pokemons.name: minun
pokemons.quote:
MINUN is more concerned about cheering
on its partners than its own safety.
It shorts out the electricity in its body to create brilliant showers of
sparks to cheer on its teammates.

pokemons.name: volbeat
pokemons.quote:
With the arrival of night, VOLBEAT emits
light from its tail. It communicates with
others by adjusting the intensity and flashing of its light.
This POKéMON is attracted by the sweet
aroma of ILLUMISE.

pokemons.name: illumise
pokemons.quote:
ILLUMISE attracts a swarm of VOLBEAT
using a sweet fragrance. Once the
VOLBEAT have gathered, this POKéMON leads the lit-up swarm in drawing
geometric designs on the canvas of
the night sky.

pokemons.name: roselia
pokemons.quote:
両手の　花を　ねらう　相手には
鋭い　トゲを　飛ばして　攻撃する。
花の　香りは　気持ちを　和ませる。

pokemons.name: gulpin
pokemons.quote:
Virtually all of GULPIN’s body is its
stomach. As a result, it can swallow
something its own size. This POKéMON’s stomach contains a
special fluid that digests anything.

pokemons.name: swalot
pokemons.quote:
It swallows anything whole.
It sweats toxic fluids from its
follicles to douse foes.

pokemons.name: carvanha
pokemons.quote:
CARVANHA’s strongly developed jaws
and its sharply pointed fangs pack the
destructive power to rip out boat hulls. Many boats have been attacked and
sunk by this POKéMON.

pokemons.name: sharpedo
pokemons.quote:
Nicknamed “the bully of the sea,”
SHARPEDO is widely feared.
Its cruel fangs grow back immediately if they snap off.
Just one of these POKéMON can
thoroughly tear apart a supertanker.

pokemons.name: wailmer
pokemons.quote:
It bounces playfully like a ball. The more seawater
it swallows, the higher it bounces.

pokemons.name: wailord
pokemons.quote:
WAILORD is the largest of all identified
POKéMON up to now.
This giant POKéMON swims languorously in the vast open sea, eating massive
amounts of food at once with its
enormous mouth.

pokemons.name: numel
pokemons.quote:
NUMEL is extremely dull witted - it
doesn’t notice being hit. However, it
can’t stand hunger for even a second. This POKéMON’s body is a seething
cauldron of boiling magma.

pokemons.name: camerupt
pokemons.quote:
CAMERUPT has a volcano inside its body.
Magma of 18,000 degrees F courses
through its body. Occasionally, the humps on this
POKéMON’s back erupt, spewing the
superheated magma.

pokemons.name: torkoal
pokemons.quote:
TORKOAL digs through mountains in
search of coal. If it finds some, it fills
hollow spaces on its shell with the coal and burns it.
If it is attacked, this POKéMON spouts
thick black smoke to beat a retreat.

pokemons.name: spoink
pokemons.quote:
SPOINK bounces around on its tail.
The shock of its bouncing makes its
heart pump. As a result, this POKéMON cannot afford to stop bouncing - if it
stops, its heart will stop.

pokemons.name: grumpig
pokemons.quote:
GRUMPIG uses the black pearls on its
body to amplify its psychic power waves
for gaining total control over its foe. When this POKéMON uses its special
power, its snorting breath grows
labored.

pokemons.name: spinda
pokemons.quote:
All the SPINDA that exist in the
world are said to have utterly unique
spot patterns. The shaky, tottering steps of this
POKéMON give it the appearance of
dancing.

pokemons.name: trapinch
pokemons.quote:
Its big jaws crunch through boulders.
Because its head is so big, it has a hard
time getting back upright if it tips over
onto its back.

pokemons.name: vibrava
pokemons.quote:
To make prey faint, VIBRAVA generates
ultrasonic waves by vigorously making
its two wings vibrate. This POKéMON’s ultrasonic waves are so
powerful, they can bring on headaches
in people.

pokemons.name: flygon
pokemons.quote:
FLYGON is nicknamed “the elemental 
spirit of the desert.” Because its
flapping wings whip up a cloud of sand, this POKéMON is always enveloped in a
sandstorm while flying.

pokemons.name: cacnea
pokemons.quote:
CACNEA lives in arid locations such
as deserts. It releases a strong aroma
from its flower to attract prey. When prey comes near, this POKéMON
shoots sharp thorns from its body to
bring the victim down.

pokemons.name: cacturne
pokemons.quote:
During the daytime, CACTURNE remains
unmoving so that it does not lose any
moisture to the harsh desert sun. This POKéMON becomes active at night
when the temperature drops.

pokemons.name: swablu
pokemons.quote:
SWABLU has light and fluffy wings that
are like cottony clouds. This POKéMON
is not frightened of people. It lands on the heads of people and
sits there like a cotton-fluff hat.

pokemons.name: altaria
pokemons.quote:
ALTARIA dances and wheels through the
sky among billowing, cotton-like clouds.
By singing melodies in its crystal-clear voice, this POKéMON makes its listeners
experience dreamy wonderment.

pokemons.name: zangoose
pokemons.quote:
Se sente anche solo l’odore di Seviper, gli si rizza
la pelliccia. Lacera il nemico con artigli affilati.

pokemons.name: seviper
pokemons.quote:
SEVIPER shares a generations-long
feud with ZANGOOSE. The scars on its
body are evidence of vicious battles. This POKéMON attacks using its sword-
edged tail.

pokemons.name: lunatone
pokemons.quote:
LUNATONE was discovered at a location
where a meteorite fell. As a result, some
people theorize that this POKéMON came from space. However, no one has
been able to prove this theory so far.

pokemons.name: solrock
pokemons.quote:
SOLROCK is a new species of POKéMON
that is said to have fallen from space.
It floats in air and moves silently. In battle, this POKéMON releases
intensely bright light.

pokemons.name: barboach
pokemons.quote:
BARBOACH’s sensitive whiskers serve
as a superb radar system.
This POKéMON hides in mud, leaving only its two whiskers exposed while it waits
for prey to come along.

pokemons.name: whiscash
pokemons.quote:
WHISCASH is extremely territorial.
Just one of these POKéMON will claim a
large pond as its exclusive territory. If a foe approaches it, it thrashes
about and triggers a massive
earthquake.

pokemons.name: corphish
pokemons.quote:
CORPHISH were originally foreign
POKéMON that were imported as pets.
They eventually turned up in the wild. This POKéMON is very hardy and has
greatly increased its population.

pokemons.name: crawdaunt
pokemons.quote:
CRAWDAUNT has an extremely violent
nature that compels it to challenge
other living things to battle. Other life-forms refuse to live in
ponds inhabited by this POKéMON,
making them desolate places.

pokemons.name: baltoy
pokemons.quote:
BALTOY moves while spinning around on
its one foot. Primitive wall paintings
depicting this POKéMON living among people were discovered in some ancient
ruins.

pokemons.name: claydol
pokemons.quote:
CLAYDOL are said to be dolls of mud made
by primitive humans and brought to life
by exposure to a mysterious ray. This POKéMON moves about while
levitating.

pokemons.name: lileep
pokemons.quote:
LILEEP became extinct approximately
a hundred million years ago.
This ancient POKéMON attaches itself to a rock on the seafloor and catches
approaching prey using tentacles 
shaped like flower petals.

pokemons.name: cradily
pokemons.quote:
CRADILY roams around the ocean floor
in search of food. This POKéMON freely
extends its tree trunk-like neck and captures unwary prey using its eight
tentacles.

pokemons.name: anorith
pokemons.quote:
ANORITH was regenerated from a
prehistoric fossil. This primitive
POKéMON once lived in warm seas. It grips its prey firmly between its
two large claws.

pokemons.name: armaldo
pokemons.quote:
ARMALDO’s tough armor makes all attacks
bounce off. This POKéMON’s two
enormous claws can be freely extended or contracted. They have the power to
punch right through a steel slab.

pokemons.name: feebas
pokemons.quote:
FEEBAS’s fins are ragged and
tattered from the start of its life.
Because of its shoddy appearance, this POKéMON is largely ignored.
It is capable of living in both the sea
and in rivers.

pokemons.name: milotic
pokemons.quote:
Es el Pokémon más hermoso del mundo. Milotic ha
inspirado numerosas obras de arte.

pokemons.name: castform
pokemons.quote:
CASTFORM’s appearance changes with
the weather.
This POKéMON gained the ability to use the vast power of nature to protect
its tiny body.

pokemons.name: kecleon
pokemons.quote:
KECLEON is capable of changing its body
colors at will to blend in with its
surroundings. There is one exception - this POKéMON
can’t change the zigzag pattern on its
belly.

pokemons.name: shuppet
pokemons.quote:
SHUPPET is attracted by feelings
of jealousy and vindictiveness.
If someone develops strong feelings of vengeance, this POKéMON will appear
in a swarm and line up beneath the eaves
of that person’s home.

pokemons.name: banette
pokemons.quote:
BANETTE generates energy for laying
strong curses by sticking pins into its
own body. This POKéMON was originally a pitiful
plush doll that was thrown away.

pokemons.name: duskull
pokemons.quote:
DUSKULL can pass through any wall no
matter how thick it may be.
Once this POKéMON chooses a target, it will doggedly pursue the intended
victim until the break of dawn.

pokemons.name: dusclops
pokemons.quote:
DUSCLOPS’s body is completely hollow -
there is nothing at all inside.
It is said that its body is like a black hole. This POKéMON will absorb anything
into its body, but nothing will ever come
back out.

pokemons.name: tropius
pokemons.quote:
The bunches of fruit around TROPIUS’s
neck are very popular with children.
This POKéMON loves fruit, and eats it continuously. Apparently, its love for
fruit resulted in its own outgrowth
of fruit.

pokemons.name: chimecho
pokemons.quote:
Emitting ultrasonic cries, it
floats on winds to travel great
distances.

pokemons.name: absol
pokemons.quote:
Every time ABSOL appears before people,
it is followed by a disaster such as an
earthquake or a tidal wave. As a result, it came to be known as the
disaster POKéMON.

pokemons.name: wynaut
pokemons.quote:
WYNAUT can always be seen with a big,
happy smile on its face. Look at its tail
to determine if it is angry. When angered, this POKéMON will be
slapping the ground with its tail.

pokemons.name: snorunt
pokemons.quote:
SNORUNT live in regions with heavy
snowfall. In seasons without snow, such
as spring and summer, this POKéMON steals away to live quietly among
stalactites and stalagmites deep in
caverns.

pokemons.name: glalie
pokemons.quote:
從大大的嘴巴裡噴出寒氣，
把獵物瞬間凍得硬梆梆的，
然後大口咬碎享用。

pokemons.name: spheal
pokemons.quote:
SPHEAL is much faster rolling than 
walking to get around. When groups of
this POKéMON eat, they all clap at once to show their pleasure. Because of this,
their mealtimes are noisy.

pokemons.name: sealeo
pokemons.quote:
SEALEO has the habit of always juggling
on the tip of its nose anything it sees
for the first time. This POKéMON occasionally entertains
itself by balancing and rolling a SPHEAL
on its nose.

pokemons.name: walrein
pokemons.quote:
WALREIN’s two massively developed
tusks can totally shatter blocks of
ice weighing ten tons with one blow. This POKéMON’s thick coat of blubber
insulates it from subzero temperatures.

pokemons.name: clamperl
pokemons.quote:
CLAMPERL’s sturdy shell is not only good
for protection - it is also used for
clamping and catching prey. A fully grown CLAMPERL’s shell will be
scored with nicks and scratches all
over.

pokemons.name: huntail
pokemons.quote:
It lives deep in the pitch-dark sea.
It attracts prey by moving its tail
in mimicry of a small animal.

pokemons.name: gorebyss
pokemons.quote:
GOREBYSS lives in the southern seas
at extreme depths. Its body is built to
withstand the enormous pressure of water at incredible depths. Because of
this, this POKéMON’s body is unharmed
by ordinary attacks.

pokemons.name: relicanth
pokemons.quote:
It has remained unchanged for 100
million years. It was discovered
during a deep-sea exploration.

pokemons.name: luvdisc
pokemons.quote:
LUVDISC live in shallow seas in the
tropics. This heart-shaped POKéMON
earned its name by swimming after loving couples it spotted in the
ocean’s waves.

pokemons.name: bagon
pokemons.quote:
BAGON has a dream of one day soaring
in the sky. In doomed efforts to fly,
this POKéMON hurls itself off cliffs. As a result of its dives, its head has 
grown tough and as hard as tempered
steel.

pokemons.name: shelgon
pokemons.quote:
Inside SHELGON’s armor-like shell, cells
are in the midst of transformation
to create an entirely new body. This POKéMON’s shell is extremely heavy,
making its movements sluggish.

pokemons.name: salamence
pokemons.quote:
SALAMENCE came about as a result of a
strong, long-held dream of growing
wings. It is said that this powerful desire triggered a sudden mutation in
this POKéMON’s cells, causing it to
sprout its magnificent wings.

pokemons.name: beldum
pokemons.quote:
Its cells are all magnetic,
and it communicates with others
by using magnetic pulses.

pokemons.name: metang
pokemons.quote:
When two BELDUM fuse together, METANG
is formed. The brains of the BELDUM are
joined by a magnetic nervous system. By linking its brains magnetically,
this POKéMON generates strong
psychokinetic power.

pokemons.name: metagross
pokemons.quote:
METAGROSS has four brains in total.
Combined, the four brains can breeze
through difficult calculations faster than a supercomputer.
This POKéMON can float in the air by
tucking in its four legs.

pokemons.name: regirock
pokemons.quote:
REGIROCK was sealed away by people
long ago. If this POKéMON’s body is
damaged in battle, it is said to seek out suitable rocks on its own to repair
itself.

pokemons.name: regice
pokemons.quote:
REGICE’s body was made during an ice
age. The deep-frozen body can’t be
melted, even by fire. This POKéMON controls frigid air of
minus 328 degrees F.

pokemons.name: registeel
pokemons.quote:
REGISTEEL has a body that is harder
than any kind of metal.
Its body is apparently hollow. No one has any idea what this POKéMON
eats.

pokemons.name: latias
pokemons.quote:
LATIAS is highly sensitive to the
emotions of people. If it senses any
hostility, this POKéMON ruffles the feathers all over its body and cries
shrilly to intimidate the foe.

pokemons.name: latios
pokemons.quote:
Un Pokémon très intelligent. Il
peut voler plus vite qu’un avion à
réaction en repliant ses ailes.

pokemons.name: kyogre
pokemons.quote:
KYOGRE has the power to create massive
rain clouds that cover the entire sky
and bring about torrential downpours. This POKéMON saved people who were
suffering from droughts.

pokemons.name: groudon
pokemons.quote:
GROUDON has long been described in 
mythology as the POKéMON that raised
lands and expanded continents. This POKéMON took to sleep after a
cataclysmic battle with KYOGRE.

pokemons.name: rayquaza
pokemons.quote:
RAYQUAZA lived for hundreds of millions
of years in the earth’s ozone layer, 
never descending to the ground. This POKéMON appears to feed on water
and particles in the atmosphere.

pokemons.name: jirachi
pokemons.quote:
A legend states that JIRACHI will make
true any wish that is written on notes
attached to its head when it awakens. If this POKéMON senses danger, it will
fight without awakening.

pokemons.name: deoxys-normal
pokemons.quote:
The DNA of a space virus underwent a
sudden mutation upon exposure to a
laser beam and resulted in DEOXYS. The crystalline organ on this POKéMON’s
chest appears to be its brain.

pokemons.name: turtwig
pokemons.quote:
Made from soil, the shell on its
back hardens when it drinks water.
It lives along lakes.

pokemons.name: grotle
pokemons.quote:
숲 속의 물가에서 산다.
낮에는 숲 밖으로 나와서
등껍질의 나무에 빛을 쬔다.

pokemons.name: torterra
pokemons.quote:
Small Pokémon occasionally gather
on its unmoving back to begin
building their nests.

pokemons.name: chimchar
pokemons.quote:
It agilely scales sheer cliffs to
live atop craggy mountains. Its
fire is put out when it sleeps.

pokemons.name: monferno
pokemons.quote:
To intimidate attackers, it
stretches the fire on its tail
to make itself appear bigger.

pokemons.name: infernape
pokemons.quote:
It uses a special kind of martial
arts involving all its limbs.
Its fire never goes out.

pokemons.name: piplup
pokemons.quote:
Because it is very proud, it hates
accepting food from people. Its
thick down guards it from cold.

pokemons.name: prinplup
pokemons.quote:
It lives alone, away from others.
Apparently, every one of them
believes it is the most important.

pokemons.name: empoleon
pokemons.quote:
The three horns that extend from
its beak attest to its power. The
leader has the biggest horns.

pokemons.name: starly
pokemons.quote:
They flock in great numbers.
Though small, they flap their
wings with great power.

pokemons.name: staravia
pokemons.quote:
It flies around forests and fields
in search of bug Pokémon.
It stays within a huge flock.

pokemons.name: staraptor
pokemons.quote:
It has a savage nature. It will
courageously challenge foes that
are much larger.

pokemons.name: bidoof
pokemons.quote:
With nerves of steel, nothing can
perturb it. It is more agile and
active than it appears.

pokemons.name: bibarel
pokemons.quote:
It makes its nest by damming
streams with bark and mud. It is
known as an industrious worker.

pokemons.name: kricketot
pokemons.quote:
It shakes its head back to front,
causing its antennae to hit each
other and sound like a xylophone.

pokemons.name: kricketune
pokemons.quote:
It crosses its knifelike arms in
front of its chest when it cries.
It can compose melodies ad lib.

pokemons.name: shinx
pokemons.quote:
All of its fur dazzles if danger is
sensed. It flees while the foe is
momentarily blinded.

pokemons.name: luxio
pokemons.quote:
Its claws loose electricity with
enough amperage to cause fainting.
They live in small groups.

pokemons.name: luxray
pokemons.quote:
It has eyes that can see through
anything. It spots and captures
prey hiding behind objects.

pokemons.name: budew
pokemons.quote:
Over the winter, it closes its bud
and endures the cold. In spring,
the bud opens and releases pollen.

pokemons.name: roserade
pokemons.quote:
It attracts prey with a sweet
aroma, then downs it with
thorny whips hidden in its arms.

pokemons.name: cranidos
pokemons.quote:
It lived in jungles around 100
million years ago. Its skull is as
hard as iron.

pokemons.name: rampardos
pokemons.quote:
Its powerful head butt has enough
power to shatter even the most
durable things upon impact.

pokemons.name: shieldon
pokemons.quote:
A Pokémon that lived in jungles
around 100 million years ago. Its
facial hide is extremely hard.

pokemons.name: bastiodon
pokemons.quote:
Any frontal attack is repulsed.
It is a docile Pokémon that
feeds on grass and berries.

pokemons.name: burmy
pokemons.quote:
To shelter itself from cold, wintry
winds, it covers itself with a cloak
made of twigs and leaves.

pokemons.name: wormadam-plant
pokemons.quote:
When BURMY evolved, its cloak
became a part of this Pokémon’s
body. The cloak is never shed.

pokemons.name: mothim
pokemons.quote:
It loves the honey of flowers
and steals honey collected by
COMBEE.

pokemons.name: combee
pokemons.quote:
A Pokémon formed by three others.
It busily carries sweet floral
honey to VESPIQUEN.

pokemons.name: vespiquen
pokemons.quote:
Its abdomen is a honeycomb for
grubs. It raises its grubs on
honey collected by COMBEE.

pokemons.name: pachirisu
pokemons.quote:
It makes fur balls that crackle
with static electricity. It stores
them with berries in tree holes.

pokemons.name: buizel
pokemons.quote:
It has a flotation sac that is
like an inflatable collar. It floats
on water with its head out.

pokemons.name: floatzel
pokemons.quote:
It floats using its well-developed
flotation sac. It assists in the
rescues of drowning people.

pokemons.name: cherubi
pokemons.quote:
The small ball holds the nutrients
needed for evolution. Apparently,
it is very sweet and tasty.

pokemons.name: cherrim
pokemons.quote:
It blooms during times of strong
sunlight. It tries to make up for
everything it endured as a bud.

pokemons.name: shellos
pokemons.quote:
Cambia facilmente aspetto e colore secondo il luogo
di provenienza.

pokemons.name: gastrodon
pokemons.quote:
It has a pliable body without any
bones. If any part of its body is
torn off, it grows right back.

pokemons.name: ambipom
pokemons.quote:
To eat, it deftly shucks nuts
with its two tails. It rarely uses
its arms now.

pokemons.name: drifloon
pokemons.quote:
Pokémon formato dalle anime di persone e Pokémon.
Ama le stagioni umide.

pokemons.name: drifblim
pokemons.quote:
It’s drowzy in daytime, but flies
off in the evening in big groups.
No one knows where they go.

pokemons.name: buneary
pokemons.quote:
It slams foes by sharply uncoiling
its rolled ears. It stings enough
to make a grown-up cry in pain.

pokemons.name: lopunny
pokemons.quote:
An extremely cautious Pokémon.
It cloaks its body with its fluffy
ear fur when it senses danger.

pokemons.name: mismagius
pokemons.quote:
Its cries sound like incantations.
Those hearing it are tormented
by headaches and hallucinations.

pokemons.name: honchkrow
pokemons.quote:
Becoming active at night, it is
known to swarm with numerous
MURKROW in tow.

pokemons.name: glameow
pokemons.quote:
It claws if displeased and purrs
when affectionate. Its fickleness
is very popular among some.

pokemons.name: purugly
pokemons.quote:
Para intimidar y parecer más corpulento, se aprieta la cintura
con su cola bífida.

pokemons.name: chingling
pokemons.quote:
It emits cries by agitating an orb
at the back of its throat.
It moves with flouncing hops.

pokemons.name: stunky
pokemons.quote:
It protects itself by spraying a
noxious fluid from its rear. The
stench lingers for 24 hours.

pokemons.name: skuntank
pokemons.quote:
It sprays a vile-smelling fluid
from the tip of its tail to attack.
Its range is over 160 feet.

pokemons.name: bronzor
pokemons.quote:
Implements shaped like it were
discovered in ancient tombs. It is
unknown if they are related.

pokemons.name: bronzong
pokemons.quote:
One caused a news sensation when
it was dug up at a construction
site after a 2,000-year sleep.

pokemons.name: bonsly
pokemons.quote:
It prefers an arid atmosphere. It
leaks water that looks like tears
when adjusting its moisture level.

pokemons.name: mime-jr
pokemons.quote:
It habitually mimics foes. Once
mimicked, the foe cannot take its
eyes off this Pokémon.

pokemons.name: happiny
pokemons.quote:
It loves round white things.
It carries an egg-shaped rock in
imitation of CHANSEY.

pokemons.name: chatot
pokemons.quote:
It can learn and speak human
words. If they gather, they all
learn the same saying.

pokemons.name: spiritomb
pokemons.quote:
A Pokémon that was formed by 108
spirits. It is bound to a fissure
in an odd keystone.

pokemons.name: gible
pokemons.quote:
It nests in small, horizontal holes
in cave walls. It pounces to catch
prey that stray too close.

pokemons.name: gabite
pokemons.quote:
There is a long-held belief that
medicine made from its scales will
heal even incurable illnesses.

pokemons.name: garchomp
pokemons.quote:
Quando si piega e distende le ali, sembra un jet.
Vola a una velocità supersonica.

pokemons.name: munchlax
pokemons.quote:
It wolfs down its weight in food
once a day, swallowing food whole
with almost no chewing.

pokemons.name: riolu
pokemons.quote:
The aura that emanates from its
body intensifies to alert others
if it is afraid or sad.

pokemons.name: lucario
pokemons.quote:
It has the ability to sense the
auras of all things.
It understands human speech.

pokemons.name: hippopotas
pokemons.quote:
It lives in arid places. Instead
of perspiration, it expels grainy
sand from its body.

pokemons.name: hippowdon
pokemons.quote:
It blasts internally stored sand
from ports on its body to create
a towering twister for attack.

pokemons.name: skorupi
pokemons.quote:
It grips prey with its tail claws
and injects poison. It tenaciously
hangs on until the poison takes.

pokemons.name: drapion
pokemons.quote:
It has the power in its clawed
arms to make scrap of a car. The
tips of its claws release poison.

pokemons.name: croagunk
pokemons.quote:
Its cheeks hold poison sacs.
It tries to catch foes off guard
to jab them with toxic fingers.

pokemons.name: toxicroak
pokemons.quote:
Its knuckle claws secrete a toxin
so vile that even a scratch could
prove fatal.

pokemons.name: carnivine
pokemons.quote:
It attracts prey with its sweet-
smelling saliva, then chomps down.
It takes a whole day to eat prey.

pokemons.name: finneon
pokemons.quote:
After long exposure to sunlight,
the patterns on its tail fins shine
vividly when darkness arrives.

pokemons.name: lumineon
pokemons.quote:
It lives on the deep-sea floor.
It attracts prey by flashing the
patterns on its four tail fins.

pokemons.name: mantyke
pokemons.quote:
A friendly Pokémon that captures
the subtle flows of seawater using
its two antennae.

pokemons.name: snover
pokemons.quote:
It lives on snowy mountains.
Having had little contact with
humans, it is boldly inquisitive.

pokemons.name: abomasnow
pokemons.quote:
It whips up blizzards in mountains
that are always buried in snow.
It is the abominable snowman.

pokemons.name: weavile
pokemons.quote:
They live in cold regions, forming
groups of four or five that hunt
prey with impressive coordination.

pokemons.name: magnezone
pokemons.quote:
It evolved from exposure to a
special magnetic field.
Three units generate magnetism.

pokemons.name: lickilicky
pokemons.quote:
It wraps things with its extensible
tongue. Getting too close to it
will leave you soaked with drool.

pokemons.name: rhyperior
pokemons.quote:
It puts rocks in holes in its palms
and uses its muscles to shoot them.
GEODUDE are shot at rare times.

pokemons.name: tangrowth
pokemons.quote:
It ensnares prey by extending
arms made of vines. Losing arms to
predators does not trouble it.

pokemons.name: electivire
pokemons.quote:
It pushes the tips of its two tails
against the foe, then lets loose
with over 20,000 volts of power.

pokemons.name: magmortar
pokemons.quote:
It blasts fireballs of over 3,600
degrees F from the ends of its
arms. It lives in volcanic craters.

pokemons.name: togekiss
pokemons.quote:
It will never appear where there
is strife. Its sightings have
become rare recently.

pokemons.name: yanmega
pokemons.quote:
Seine bevorzugte Strategie besteht darin, seine Gegner aus
dem Flug blitzartig zur Strecke zu bringen.

pokemons.name: leafeon
pokemons.quote:
Just like a plant, it uses
photosynthesis. As a result, it is
always enveloped in clear air.

pokemons.name: glaceon
pokemons.quote:
As a protective technique, it can
completely freeze its fur to make
its hairs stand like needles.

pokemons.name: gliscor
pokemons.quote:
It observes prey while hanging
inverted from branches. When the
chance presents itself, it swoops!

pokemons.name: mamoswine
pokemons.quote:
Its impressive tusks are made of
ice. The population thinned when it
turned warm after the ice age.

pokemons.name: porygon-z
pokemons.quote:
Additional software was installed
to make it a better Pokémon.
It began acting oddly, however.

pokemons.name: gallade
pokemons.quote:
A master of courtesy and
swordsmanship, it fights using
extending swords on its elbows.

pokemons.name: probopass
pokemons.quote:
Il utilise sa force magnétique pour
diriger trois petites unités
appelées Mini-nez.

pokemons.name: dusknoir
pokemons.quote:
Man sagt, dass es verlorene Seelen in seinem biegsamen
Körper nach Hause geleite.

pokemons.name: froslass
pokemons.quote:
It freezes foes with an icy breath
nearly -60 degrees F. What seems
to be its body is actually hollow.

pokemons.name: rotom
pokemons.quote:
Un Pokémon longtemps étudié comme source
d’énergie pour un moteur très spécial.

pokemons.name: uxie
pokemons.quote:
Known as “The Being of Knowledge.”
It is said that it can wipe out the
memory of those who see its eyes.

pokemons.name: mesprit
pokemons.quote:
Known as “The Being of Emotion.”
It taught humans the nobility of
sorrow, pain, and joy.

pokemons.name: azelf
pokemons.quote:
It is thought that Uxie, Mesprit, and Azelf all came
from the same egg.

pokemons.name: dialga
pokemons.quote:
It has the power to control time.
It appears in Sinnoh-region myths
as an ancient deity.

pokemons.name: palkia
pokemons.quote:
It has the ability to distort
space. It is described as a deity
in Sinnoh-region mythology.

pokemons.name: heatran
pokemons.quote:
It dwells in volcanic caves. It
digs in with its cross-shaped feet
to crawl on ceilings and walls.

pokemons.name: regigigas
pokemons.quote:
There is an enduring legend that
states this Pokémon towed
continents with ropes.

pokemons.name: giratina-altered
pokemons.quote:
A Pokémon that is said to live in a
world on the reverse side of ours.
It appears in an ancient cemetery.

pokemons.name: cresselia
pokemons.quote:
Shiny particles are released from
its wings like a veil. It is said
to represent the crescent moon.

pokemons.name: phione
pokemons.quote:
A Pokémon that lives in warm seas.
It inflates the flotation sac on its
head to drift and search for food.

pokemons.name: manaphy
pokemons.quote:
Born on a cold seafloor, it
will swim great distances to
return to its birthplace.

pokemons.name: darkrai
pokemons.quote:
It can lull people to sleep and
make them dream. It is active
during nights of the new moon.

pokemons.name: shaymin-land
pokemons.quote:
Puede disolver las toxinas del aire para transformar
tierra yerma en campos de flores.

pokemons.name: arceus
pokemons.quote:
It is told in mythology that this Pokémon was born
before the universe even existed.

pokemons.name: victini
pokemons.quote:
Un Pokémon qui amène la victoire. On dit
que les Dresseurs qui le possèdent
peuvent gagner n’importe quel combat.

pokemons.name: snivy
pokemons.quote:
Un Pokémon intelligent et très calme.
Lorsqu’il a reçu suffisamment de
lumière du soleil, il devient plus agile.

pokemons.name: servine
pokemons.quote:
Il court comme s’il glissait sur le sol.
Il déroute l’ennemi par ses mouvements
et l’assomme d’un coup de liane.

pokemons.name: serperior
pokemons.quote:
Il peut paralyser l’ennemi d’un regard.
Il amplifie l’énergie du soleil dans
son corps.

pokemons.name: tepig
pokemons.quote:
Il évite agilement les attaques ennemies
et crache des boules de feu par le groin.
Il aime griller des Baies pour les manger.

pokemons.name: pignite
pokemons.quote:
Quand le feu dans son corps s’embrase,
sa vitesse et son agilité augmentent.
En cas d’urgence, il crache de la fumée.

pokemons.name: emboar
pokemons.quote:
Il embrase ses poings avec les flammes
sur son menton et cogne l’ennemi avec.
C’est un Pokémon très solidaire.

pokemons.name: oshawott
pokemons.quote:
Il combat avec le coupillage de son
ventre. Il peut parer un assaut et
immédiatement contre-attaquer.

pokemons.name: dewott
pokemons.quote:
L’apprentissage de sa technique de
combat, qui utilise élégamment ses deux
coupillages, est extrêmement rigoureux.

pokemons.name: samurott
pokemons.quote:
Il peut terrasser ses ennemis d’un coup
de la lame enchâssée dans son armure,
et les faire taire d’un seul regard.

pokemons.name: patrat
pokemons.quote:
Ils stockent à manger dans leurs
bajoues et font le guet indéfiniment. Ils
se font des signes en remuant la queue.

pokemons.name: watchog
pokemons.quote:
Il attaque en crachant les graines des
Baies qu’il accumule dans ses bajoues.
S’il voit un ennemi, il dresse la queue.

pokemons.name: lillipup
pokemons.quote:
Il fait vaillamment face à des ennemis
très puissants, mais il est intelligent
et évite les combats trop inégaux.

pokemons.name: herdier
pokemons.quote:
Les poils qui entourent son corps
comme un manteau sont extrêmement
durs et amortissent les coups.

pokemons.name: stoutland
pokemons.quote:
Il sauve les gens bloqués dans les
montagnes par des tempêtes de neige.
Ses longs poils le protègent du froid.

pokemons.name: purrloin
pokemons.quote:
Il vole les gens pour le plaisir, mais il
est tellement mignon que ses victimes
finissent toujours par lui pardonner.

pokemons.name: liepard
pokemons.quote:
Un Pokémon insaisissable. Son style
et son pelage magnifique attirent de
nombreux Dresseurs.

pokemons.name: pansage
pokemons.quote:
Il vit dans les forêts profondes.
Manger la feuille qui pousse sur
sa tête fait disparaître la fatigue.

pokemons.name: simisage
pokemons.quote:
Il a un tempérament violent et se
bat avec sa queue pleine d’épines.
La feuille sur sa tête est très amère.

pokemons.name: pansear
pokemons.quote:
Quand il s’énerve, la mèche sur sa
tête chauffe à 300 °C. Il s’en sert
pour griller des Baies et les manger.

pokemons.name: simisear
pokemons.quote:
Il adore les aliments sucrés. Ils lui
servent d’énergie pour alimenter le
feu à l’intérieur de son corps.

pokemons.name: panpour
pokemons.quote:
L’eau contenue dans la mèche sur sa
tête est pleine de nutriments. Elle fait
pousser les plantes avec vigueur.

pokemons.name: simipour
pokemons.quote:
Il stocke de l’eau dans les mèches de sa
tête. Quand il est à sec, il se ravitaille
en aspirant de l’eau par la queue.

pokemons.name: munna
pokemons.quote:
Quand Munna mange un rêve, celui-ci
est aussitôt oublié par le rêveur.
Il lévite en permanence.

pokemons.name: musharna
pokemons.quote:
La fumée qui sort de son front contient
les rêves de nombreuses personnes et
ceux de nombreux Pokémon.

pokemons.name: pidove
pokemons.quote:
Il suit scrupuleusement les consignes
de son Dresseur, mais il a du mal à
comprendre les ordres trop compliqués.

pokemons.name: tranquill
pokemons.quote:
Aussi éloigné qu’il puisse se trouver,
il parvient toujours à retourner
auprès de son Dresseur.

pokemons.name: unfezant
pokemons.quote:
Le mâle intimide ses ennemis
avec ses caroncules.
La femelle vole mieux que le mâle.

pokemons.name: blitzle
pokemons.quote:
Leur crinière scintille quand ils lâchent
une décharge électrique. Ils se servent
de ces scintillements pour communiquer.

pokemons.name: zebstrika
pokemons.quote:
